Html:
I just downloaded the x12Parser and tried the x12parser.exe and it works nicely.

In the download there is an tranformToX12.exe, what it will do?  

I am looking for something to transform a asi 837p to the 1500 print version.

TransformToX12 will transform the xml generated by x12parser back into X12 format so that those who want to make modifications to the xml instead of x12 can change it back to x12.

I am working on a transformation to the CMS 1500, but it make take another 1-2 months for me to complete.

It is in the OopFactory.X12.Hipaa assembly that I have not yet released.  I plan to release a maintenance release today, and start releasing the Hipaa transformations in about 5-6 weeks.
